https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qbxCjc1UIkDBEvDQWnLWqSVIyIy.jpg The two best friends Casper and Emma goes on a cabin holiday for skiing fun. Tough guy Petter is a good skier, and Casper thinks Emma likes him more. Maybe he can prove himself if he competes in a ski jumping competition? Casper and Emma's Winter Vacation
